comments:
Build: I20060829-0800

1. Create a build.xml for any plug-in project by selecting PDE Tools > Create Ant build file from the context menu of a plugin.xml

2. right-click on the build.xml and select Run As > Ant Build...

You will see 21 consecutive error dialogs before the LCD appears.  The LCD will be missing the tree viewer.

you will find 21 instances of this error in the log:

eclipse.buildId=I20060829-0800
java.version=1.5.0_03
java.vendor=Sun Microsystems Inc.
BootLoader constants: OS=win32, ARCH=x86, WS=win32, NL=en_US
Command-line arguments:  -os win32 -ws win32 -arch x86 -data D:\Eclipse\UpdatedSource\plugins

Can reproduce on I20060822-1200 as well.

After clicking through all the error dialogs...the LCD did seem to come up in usable form.

Not sure what changed here as the Ant code that is failing has not been altered since Jan 2005.

We were returning null text for a table column which apparantly now fails horribly.

Changes to:
AntObjectLabelProvider : do not return null --> return empty string for a column with no data
AntPropertiesBlock: took this opportunity to limit the rows shown by default in the table of this block
